title: The Great Raid: Rescuing the Doomed Ghosts of Bataan and Corregidor
description: Provides an in-depth account of the fall of the Philippines during World War II to the Japanese, the harsh treatment of American and Filipino POWs, and the 1945 raid by a band of American Rangers and Filipino Scouts on a Japanese POW camp to liberated incarcerated American soldiers. Reprint.
author: William B. Breuer
